Articles.Content: Hi this is a question topic im not sure if this is the right place to place this. The question is how to move the camera up and down, in ksp it's simply alt and scroll wheel, it didn't work in ksp 2, i checked in setting and didn't find anything around that.
Middle mouse button and drag up/down/left/right. Of course, right click and drag to rotate.

11 minutes ago, Casellina X said:

Middle mouse button and drag up/down/left/right. Of course, right click and drag to rotate.

got it thank you
Feels bad somehow. Middle click dragging often makes your mouse wheel rotate or tilt. This is not nice. Maybe it can be reconfigured?
